# verify redirect block is generated when TemplateData is passed to a function (conservative)

muxt generate
cat template_routes.go
grep 'redirectURL != ""' template_routes.go

-- in.go --
package main

import "html/template"

func main() {}

func someFunc(data any) string {
	return "hello"
}
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var templatesDir embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.New("").Funcs(template.FuncMap{
	"someFunc": someFunc,
}).ParseFS(templatesDir, "template.gohtml"))
-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.25
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET / 200"}}{{someFunc .}}{{end}}
